languages.text: "Прошу, элантах, доберемся же до челнока! Я чувствую, как нить судьбы надорвалась и вот-вот лопнет. Я не могу упустить, быть может, единственный шанс разгадать тайну, что связана с исчезновением моего дома".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу, элантах, доберемся же до челнока! Я чувствую, как нить судьбы надорвалась и вот-вот лопнет. Я не могу упустить, быть может, единственный шанс разгадать тайну, что связана с исчезновением моего дома".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, элантах, доберемся же до челнока! Я чувствую, как нить судьбы надорвалась и вот-вот лопнет. Я не могу упустить, быть может, единственный шанс разгадать тайну, что связана с исчезновением моего дома".

traits.locale_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us reach the shuttle! I can feel the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us reach the shuttle! I can feel the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous en conjure, elantach, préparez immédiatement les navettes ! Le fil ténu du destin est sur le point de se rompre, je le sens. Je ne peux pas rater ce qui pourrait être ma seule et unique chance de faire toute la lumière sur la disparition de mon foyer. »
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en conjure, elantach, préparez immédiatement les navettes ! Le fil ténu du destin est sur le point de se rompre, je le sens. Je ne peux pas rater ce qui pourrait être ma seule et unique chance de faire toute la lumière sur la disparition de mon foyer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我求求你，外界人，我们快上穿梭机吧！我能感觉到，命运的丝线已经变得非常脆弱，很快就会断裂。这可能是我解决谜团的唯一机会，我必须弄清楚我的故乡是怎么消失的。”
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: “我求求你，外界人，我们快上穿梭机吧！我能感觉到，命运的丝线已经变得非常脆弱，很快就会断裂。这可能是我解决谜团的唯一机会，我必须弄清楚我的故乡是怎么消失的。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich flehe Euch an, Elantach, fliegen wir zu dem Shuttle! Ich spüre, dass der Schicksalsfaden zerschlissen ist und bald reißen wird. Das ist vielleicht meine einzige Gelegenheit, das Verschwinden meiner Heimat aufzuklären. Ich muss sie nutzen."
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: "Ich flehe Euch an, Elantach, fliegen wir zu dem Shuttle! Ich spüre, dass der Schicksalsfaden zerschlissen ist und bald reißen wird. Das ist vielleicht meine einzige Gelegenheit, das Verschwinden meiner Heimat aufzuklären. Ich muss sie nutzen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡Elantach, déjenos ir a la lanzadera, se lo ruego! Presiento que está a punto de ocurrir algo horrible. No puedo dejar pasar la única oportunidad que tendré de descubrir el misterio de la desaparición de mi hogar».
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: «¡Elantach, déjenos ir a la lanzadera, se lo ruego! Presiento que está a punto de ocurrir algo horrible. No puedo dejar pasar la única oportunidad que tendré de descubrir el misterio de la desaparición de mi hogar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「頼む、エランタ、シャトルに向かってくれ！運命の糸が擦り減って、今にも切れそうな予感がするのだ。これが故郷が消えたその背後の謎を解く唯一のチャンスかもしれないのに、みすみす逃せない」
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."

traits.locale_text: 「頼む、エランタ、シャトルに向かってくれ！運命の糸が擦り減って、今にも切れそうな予感がするのだ。これが故郷が消えたその背後の謎を解く唯一のチャンスかもしれないのに、みすみす逃せない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, yalvarırım mekiğe gidelim! Kaderin ipleri yıpranmış, kopmak üzere. Bu, evimin neden ve nasıl ortadan kaybolduğunu öğrenmek için tek şansım olabilir. Kaçıramam bu şansı."
languages.original_text: "I am begging you, elantach, let us go to the shuttle! I can feel that the thread of fate has frayed and is about to snap. I cannot miss what may be the only chance to solve the mystery behind the disappearance of my home."
